scripts.fastlane:install: bundle config set path vendor/bundle && bundle install
scripts.mobile:android:fdroid: bun run fastlane:android:build && bun run fdroid:repo
scripts.tauri:android:init: bun run tauri:icons && tauri android init --config src-tauri/tauri.android.conf.json && node ./scripts/apply-mobile-branding.mjs
scripts.tauri:android:dev: bun run tauri:icons && node ./scripts/apply-mobile-branding.mjs && tauri android dev --config src-tauri/tauri.android.conf.json
scripts.tauri:android:build: bun run tauri:icons && node ./scripts/apply-mobile-branding.mjs && tauri android build --config src-tauri/tauri.android.conf.json
scripts.tauri:ios:init: bun run tauri:icons && tauri ios init --config src-tauri/tauri.ios.conf.json && node ./scripts/apply-mobile-branding.mjs
scripts.tauri:ios:dev: bun run tauri:icons && node ./scripts/apply-mobile-branding.mjs && tauri ios dev --config src-tauri/tauri.ios.conf.json
scripts.tauri:ios:build: bun run tauri:icons && node ./scripts/apply-mobile-branding.mjs && tauri ios build --config src-tauri/tauri.ios.conf.json
